articles.description: Jack Draper ensures there will be three British men in the French Open third round for the first time since 1968 by seeing off home favourite Gael Monfils in a late-night thriller.
articles.title: French Open 2025: Jack Draper beats Gael Monfils after Jacob Fearnley sets up Cameron Norrie clash

articles.description: Jacob Bethell's sparkling 82 in victory over West Indies in the first one-day international shows he will not be England's coming man much longer, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Jacob Bethell's star turn in first ODI shows his bright future

articles.description: Seventy-nine people were hurt when a car hit fans attending Liverpool's Premier League victory parade.
articles.title: Father-of-three Paul Doyle charged over Liverpool parade crash

articles.description: Royal Challengers Bengaluru seal a place in the Indian Premier League final with an eight-wicket thrashing of Punjab Kings.
articles.title: IPL 2025 results: RCB beat Punjab Kings to reach first final since 2016

articles.description: AC Milan sack coach Sergio Conceicao after just six months in charge, with the club having failed to qualify for Europe next season.
articles.title: AC Milan sack manager Conceicao after six months in charge

articles.description: Winning the Premier League sealed darts' triple crown for world number one Luke Humphries but he has needed to overcome personal struggles and has had advice from 16-time world champion Phil Taylor along the way.
articles.title: Luke Humphries: Premier League Darts winner on personal struggles, Phil Taylor's advice and Luke Littler

articles.description: England midfielder Ella Toone says she didn't "actually grieve" after the death of her father until a period on the sidelines through injury forced her to get "mentally right".
articles.title: Ella Toone: England midfielder said she didn't properly grieve after her father's death

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen says his championship battle against the McLaren drivers this year "doesn't really feel like a fight".
articles.title: Spanish Grand Prix 2025: Max Verstappen says title race against McLaren does not feel like a fight

articles.description: Benfica winger Angel di Maria will return to his boyhood club Rosario Central - 10 months after death threats forced him to backtrack on the same move.
articles.title: Angel di Maria: Benfica winger to return to boyhood club Rosario Central

articles.description: Manchester United say winger Amad responded to supporters with a obscene gesture after being subject to personal abuse.
articles.title: Manchester United winger Amad subject to 'serious personal abuse' on post-season tour
